amendment.description: To preserve open competition and Federal Government neutrality towards the labor relations of Federal Government contractors on Federal and federally funded construction projects.
amendment.purpose: To preserve open competition and Federal Government neutrality towards the labor relations of Federal Government contractors on Federal and federally funded construction projects.

action.text: Amendment SA 34 proposed by Senator Vitter.

vote.text: Motion to table amendment SA 34 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 59 - 38. Record Vote Number: 13.
